DOC.brief_summary: To determine effect degree fat saturation postprandial lipemia , haemostatic inflammatory marker , gut hormone concentration , satiety perception , insulinemic response healthy adult subject . Study hypothesis : The degree fat saturation affect postprandial lipemia , haemostatic inflammatory marker , gut hormone concentration , insulinemic satiety responses health adult subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Acute Effects Sn-1 Sn-3 Palmitic Acid-rich Stearic Acid-rich Fats Metabolic Markers
DOC.detailed_description: The experimental comprise 50g fat , 14g protein 84g carbohydrate . Each test fat [ palm mid fraction ( PMF ) , shea butter ( SB ) high oleic sunflower oil ( HOSF ) ] compare form experimental meal ( muffin ) . 33 volunteer receive 3 experimental meal ( muffin ) random order , 2 week apart , 6-week period . They randomize , blind undergo 3x3 arm crossover . The first 15-ml ( `` 0 '' min ) fast venous blood sample obtain . Immediately thereafter , subject consumes test meal plus glass water within 15 minute . The time sequence start mid-way consume test meal . At 30 min , 60 min , 90 , 120 min ( 2 hr ) , 150 min 180 min ( 3 hr ) , 210 min , 240 min ( 4 hr ) , 15-ml blood collect ( via vascular catheter insert earlier subject hand/arm ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy adult male female staff , age 2550 year 2 . BMI 18.5 25.0 kg/m2 3 . Blood pressure : Systolic : < 140 mmHg , diastolic : < 90 mmHg c. Normolipidemic ( Total cholesterol < 6.2 mM/L ( < 240 mg/dL ) , Fasting TG < 1.70 mM/L ( < 150 mg/dL ) d. Fasting glucose 4.0 7.0 mM/L 1 . Smokers 2 . On cholesterol blood glucose medication 3 . Substance abuse ( eg . alcohol , cigarette smoking ) 4 . For woman , pregnant lactate 5 . Going overseas period study 6 . Blood clot problem 7 . Public transportation work
